verbose_text: Thus, although Dapagliflozin intake has been reported to cause DKA in a setting of well recognized precipitating factors 5, in this patient, the absence of chest pain, with no clear electrocardiographic signs of ischemia and only a minor elevation of serum troponin, does not support that an acute coronary syndrome caused such a severe metabolic disturbance.
evidence: Dapagliflozin intake has been reported to cause DKA
